alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 13 at 6:19PM MST until July 13 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 745 PM MST. * At 619 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Estrella to near Estrella Sailport to 6 miles south of Olberg, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 158 and 201. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 110 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 167. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Tempe, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Casa Grande, Coolidge, Gila Bend, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Estrella, La Palma, Big Horn and Cotton Center. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms are unhealthy and have been known to lead to Valley Fever. Avoid outdoor exposure. Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
